title: Dynamic Realized Minimum Variance Portfolio Models. (arXiv:2310.13511v1 [stat.ME])
abstract: This paper introduces a dynamic minimum variance portfolio (MVP) model using nonlinear volatility dynamic models, based on high-frequency financial data. Specifically, we impose an autoregressive dynamic structure on MVP processes, which helps capture the MVP dynamics directly. To evaluate the dynamic MVP model, we estimate the inverse volatility matrix using the constrained $\ell_1$-minimization for inverse matrix estimation (CLIME) and calculate daily realized non-normalized MVP weights. Based on the realized non-normalized MVP weight estimator, we propose the dynamic MVP model, which we call the dynamic realized minimum variance portfolio (DR-MVP) model. To estimate a large number of parameters, we employ the least absolute shrinkage and selection operator (LASSO) and predict the future MVP and establish its asymptotic properties. Using high-frequency trading data, we apply the proposed method to MVP prediction.

translated_title: 动态实现最小方差投资组合模型
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了一种利用非线性波动率动态模型的动态最小方差投资组合（MVP）模型，基于高频金融数据。具体来说，我们将MVP过程 imposed 一个自回归动态结构，有助于直接捕捉MVP的动态。为了评估动态MVP模型，我们使用约束的$\ell_1$-最小化逆矩阵估计（CLIME）来估计逆波动率矩阵，并计算每日实现的非归一化MVP权重。基于实现的非归一化MVP权重估计器，我们提出了动态MVP模型，称为动态实现最小方差投资组合（DR-MVP）模型。为了估计大量的参数，我们采用最小绝对收缩和选择算子（LASSO），并预测未来的MVP并建立其渐近性质。使用高频交易数据，我们将所提出的方法应用于MVP预测。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于高频金融数据的动态最小方差投资组合模型，利用非线性波动率动态模型和约束的逆矩阵估计方法来捕捉最小方差投资组合的动态特性，通过LASSO进行参数估计和未来预测，并应用于高频交易数据中的投资组合预测。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a dynamic minimum variance portfolio model based on high-frequency financial data, using nonlinear volatility dynamic models and constrained inverse matrix estimation. It captures the dynamic characteristics of the minimum variance portfolio through autoregressive structure, and employs LASSO for parameter estimation and future prediction, applied to portfolio forecasting in high-frequency trading data.
